DOC.brief_summary: The goal study investigate effect dilute bleach skin subject atopic dermatitis healthy skin . The second goal evaluate effect different moisturizers skin barrier subject without atopic dermatitis . The investigator hypothesize bleach bath increase skin pH , decrease skin hydration , increase skin water loss study subject . Secondly , investigator hypothesize moisturizers low pH high water oil ratio result improve skin barrier function . Furthermore , investigator believe great improvement patient atopic dermatitis .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Diluted Sodium Hypochlorite Solution Moisturizers Skin Barrier Function Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: The study two main part . Subjects group one forearm dilute bleach bath arm water bath 10 minute . The change skin measure use different painless device . The second part study involve application 4 various moisturizers . The change skin measure period time use non-invasive device .
DOC.criteria: Age 8 year 65 year Has diagnose atopic dermatitis boardcertified dermatologist UC Davis Subject/parents/legal guardian able read comprehend study procedure consent form . Those pregnant , prisoner , cognitively impair Those fit inclusion criterion
